testimonials.subtitle: See what our community of educators and learners are saying about their EduQuiz experience.

sarah-chen.name: Sarah Chen
sarah-chen.content: EduQuiz has revolutionized how I create assessments. The AI generates perfect questions from my lesson materials in seconds!

marcus-rodriguez.name: Marcus Rodriguez
marcus-rodriguez.content: The multiplayer quiz battles with my study group make learning so much more engaging. We actually look forward to studying now!

emily-watson.name: Dr. Emily Watson
emily-watson.content: The analytics help me understand where my students struggle. It's like having a teaching assistant that never sleeps.

james-park.name: James Park
james-park.content: Creating personalized quizzes for each student used to take hours. Now it takes minutes, and the quality is outstanding.

lisa-thompson.name: Lisa Thompson
lisa-thompson.content: The gamification features have increased our learner engagement by 300%. People are actually competing to learn more!

alex-kumar.name: Alex Kumar
alex-kumar.content: Being able to turn my textbook pages into quizzes instantly is a game-changer for medical school prep. Absolutely brilliant!
